name: Don Tomas - Nicaragua - Toro
additionalNotes: Don Tomas are one of the first Honduran Cigar Companies in the industry. The Don Tomas Nicaragua cigar hails from Nicaragua and includes a tremendous blend of tobaccos to make a smooth smoke. A Nicaraguan Jalapa wrapper covers a Brazilian Arapiraca binder and four aged Nicaraguan long filler tobaccos (Condega, Estel√≠, Jalapa, and Pueblo Nuevo). Notes of leather, spice, cappucino, and pepper are found throughout. Order the Don Tomas Nicaragua cigar now and enjoy a smooth cigar packed full of flavor.
